articles.title: Gaza war: ICJ to rule on call for Israel to stop military action - BBC.com
articles.description: The ICJ could order Israel to stop military action, in a high-profile case brought by South Africa.
articles.content:
By Anna Holligan and Raffi BergBBC News, The Hague and London
The ICJ's ruling will be politically significant if it goes against Israel
The UN's top court could issue emergency measures ordering I… [+2845 chars]
